title: Miss Goodall and the wild chimpanzees
brief_description: Describes Jane Goodall and her studies as she observes and records the behaviour of wild chimpanzees in a forest reserve near Lake Tanganyika in Africa. Shows the chimpanzees engaged in both individual and social activities. Narrated by Orson Welles
description: Describes Jane Goodall and her studies as she observes and records the behaviour of wild chimpanzees in a forest reserve near Lake Tanganyika in Africa. Shows the chimpanzees engaged in both individual and social activities. Narrated by Orson Welles
